languages.text: Увы, блюстители были измотаны выпавшими на их долю испытаниями, а боевой дух их ослаб. В снежной пелене они не видели врага, лишь чувствовали, как лица их марают кровавые брызги, что прежде были их товарищами, шедшими впереди. В беспорядке воины отступили.

Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.
languages.original_text: Увы, блюстители были измотаны выпавшими на их долю испытаниями, а боевой дух их ослаб. В снежной пелене они не видели врага, лишь чувствовали, как лица их марают кровавые брызги, что прежде были их товарищами, шедшими впереди. В беспорядке воины отступили.

traits.locale_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

languages.text: 遗憾的是，士兵们早已筋疲力尽，士气低落。他们无法透过漫天飞雪看到敌人的身影，只能感觉到身边的战友前一刻还在与他们并肩作战，后一刻就一命呜呼，鲜血溅在他们脸上。士兵们陷入混乱之中，纷纷撤退。
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，士兵们早已筋疲力尽，士气低落。他们无法透过漫天飞雪看到敌人的身影，只能感觉到身边的战友前一刻还在与他们并肩作战，后一刻就一命呜呼，鲜血溅在他们脸上。士兵们陷入混乱之中，纷纷撤退。

languages.text: 哀しいかな、エンフォーサーたちは過酷な試練に疲れ果て、士気は低下している。雪に飲み込まれて敵を視認できず、ついさっきまで自分の前を進んでいた仲間の血しぶきが顔にかかるのを感じることしかできない。混乱に陥った戦士たちは退却する。
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: 哀しいかな、エンフォーサーたちは過酷な試練に疲れ果て、士気は低下している。雪に飲み込まれて敵を視認できず、ついさっきまで自分の前を進んでいた仲間の血しぶきが顔にかかるのを感じることしかできない。混乱に陥った戦士たちは退却する。

languages.text: Por desgracia, el personal de seguridad está agotado y con la moral comprometida. No pueden ver al enemigo a través de la nieve que los rodea; se limitan a sentir cómo les salpica la sangre de sus camaradas, aquellos que marchaban delante de ellos hace apenas unos instantes. Los guerreros, desorientados, acaban retirándose.
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, el personal de seguridad está agotado y con la moral comprometida. No pueden ver al enemigo a través de la nieve que los rodea; se limitan a sentir cómo les salpica la sangre de sus camaradas, aquellos que marchaban delante de ellos hace apenas unos instantes. Los guerreros, desorientados, acaban retirándose.

languages.text: Hélas, les prévôts sont épuisés et leur moral décline. La tempête de neige les empêche de distinguer l'ennemi et ils ne sentent sur leurs visages que les éclaboussures du sang de leurs camarades qui marchaient devant eux quelques instants plus tôt. Désemparés, les guerriers battent en retraite.
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: Hélas, les prévôts sont épuisés et leur moral décline. La tempête de neige les empêche de distinguer l'ennemi et ils ne sentent sur leurs visages que les éclaboussures du sang de leurs camarades qui marchaient devant eux quelques instants plus tôt. Désemparés, les guerriers battent en retraite.

languages.text: Leider sind die Enforcers von den Strapazen erschöpft, und ihre Moral schwindet. Sie sehen den Feind im Schneegestöber nicht, spüren nur die Blutspritzer von ihren Kameraden im Gesicht, die gerade eben noch direkt vor ihnen marschiert sind. Ungeordnet ziehen sich die Krieger zurück.
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: Leider sind die Enforcers von den Strapazen erschöpft, und ihre Moral schwindet. Sie sehen den Feind im Schneegestöber nicht, spüren nur die Blutspritzer von ihren Kameraden im Gesicht, die gerade eben noch direkt vor ihnen marschiert sind. Ungeordnet ziehen sich die Krieger zurück.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki infazcılar bu zor görevde çok yoruluyor, moralleri düşüyor. Etrafı kasıp kavuran kardan düşmanı göremiyor, sadece birkaç dakika önce önlerinde ilerleyen yoldaşlarının kanının yüzlerine sıçradığını hissediyorlar. Savaşçılar, kargaşa içinde geri çekiliyor.
languages.original_text: Alas, the enforcers are exhausted by their ordeal, and their morale dwindles. They cannot see the enemy through the engulfing snow, only feel the blood spatter on their faces from their comrades, who were marching ahead of them only moments ago. Thrown into disarray, the warriors retreat.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki infazcılar bu zor görevde çok yorulmuştu ve moralleri düşmüştü. Etrafı kasıp kavuran kardan düşmanı göremediler, sadece birkaç dakika önce önlerinde ilerleyen yoldaşlarının kanının yüzlerine sıçradığını hissettiler. Savaşçılar karmaşa içinde geri çekildiler.
